## Define a function to write text in typewriter font
tt <- function(x) {
  if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
    sprintf("\\texttt{%s}", as.character(x))
  } else if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
    sprintf("<tt>%s</tt>", as.character(x))
  } else {
    x
  }
}

library(httr)

## Retrieve Data from `r tt("AoC")`


```{r get-data, cache = FALSE, messages = FALSE}
session_cookie <- set_cookies(session = keyring::key_get("AoC-GitHub-Cookie"))
base_url <- paste0("https://adventofcode.com/", params$year, "/day/", params$task_nr)
puzzle <- GET(base_url,
              session_cookie) %>% 
  content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
  xml_find_all("///article") %>% 
  lapply(as.character)

parse_puzzle_data <- function(text_block = readClipboard()) {
  if (length(text_block) == 1L) {
    text_block <- text_block %>% 
      str_split("\n") %>% 
      extract2(1L) %>% 
      keep(nzchar)
  }
  text_block %>% 
    str_split(",") %>% 
    do.call(c, .) %>% 
    as.integer()
}

puzzle_data <- local({
  GET(paste0(base_url, "/input"),
      session_cookie) %>% 
    content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
    parse_puzzle_data()
})
```

# Puzzle Day `r params$task_nr`

## Part 1

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-a, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
cat(puzzle[[1]])
```

### Solution

We iterate through the sequence and execute the opcodes as indicated.

```{r get-solution-1}
parse_opcodes <- function(op_codes) {
  n <- length(op_codes)
  ip <- 1L
  fns <- list(sum, prod)
  while (ip <= n && op_codes[ip] %in% 1:2) {
    op_codes[op_codes[ip + 3L] + 1L] <- 
      fns[[op_codes[ip]]](op_codes[op_codes[ip + 1:2] + 1L])
    ip <- ip + 4L
  }
  op_codes[1L]
}

restore_gravity <- function(op_codes = puzzle_data, start = c(12L, 2L)) {
  op_codes[2:3] <- start
  parse_opcodes(op_codes)
}

restore_gravity(puzzle_data, c(12L, 2L))
```

## Part 2

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-b, echo = FALSE, results = "asis", eval = length(puzzle) > 1}
cat(puzzle[[2]])
```

### Solution

We iterate through all combinations of `99:0 x 99:0` and check if the outcome is a 
expected.

```{r get-solution-2}
find_inputs <- function(op_codes = puzzle_data) {
  for (noun in 99:0) {
    for (verb in 99:0) {
      res <- restore_gravity(op_codes, c(noun, verb))
      if (res == 19690720L) {
        return (100L * noun + verb)
      }
    }
  }
  FALSE
}

find_inputs(puzzle_data)
```
